SELECT ol.id, ol.operate_emp_id as operateEmpId, ol.operate_time as operateTime, ol.class_name as className, ol.method_name as methodName, ol.method_params as methodParams, ol.return_value as returnValue, ol.cost_time as costTime, e.name as operateEmpName
FROM operate_log ol LEFT JOIN emp e ON ol.operate_emp_id = e.id ORDER BY ol.operate_time DESC
